alert.note: Alert for Spencer; Warrick (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 9:41AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Warrick and north central Spencer Counties through 915 AM CDT... At 840 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Folsomville, or 12 miles northeast of Boonville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Dale around 855 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Santa Claus. This includes Interstate 64 in Indiana between Mile Markers 44 and 60. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
